title: Approximating $\mathrm{SU}(2)$ Chern-Simons theory by finite group gauge theories
summary: Motivated by some previously known facts from mathematical and physics literature, we explore certain relations between 3-dimensional topological gauge theories with continuous and finite gauge groups, commonly known as Chern-Simons (CS) and Dijkgraaf-Witten (DW) theories, respectively. Specifically, we consider the continuous and finite gauge groups to be the same algebraic group over the complex numbers and a finite field, respectively. In this paper, we focus on the $\mathrm{SU}(2)$ example and consider the relationship on the level of the corresponding partition functions on closed 3-manifolds. Mathematically, these are Witten-Reshetikhin-Turaev and DW invariants. We find that the asymptotics of the DW theory when the number of elements of the finite field is large recovers the leading asymptotics of the CS theory at large level when the 3-manifold contains no hyperbolic components. As a byproduct, we develop efficient techniques to count the number of points over finite fields $\mathbb{F}_q$ of $\mathrm{SL}(2)$ representation varieties of fundamental groups of 3-manifolds, possibly with weights pulled back from a chosen class in $H^3(\mathrm{SL}(2,\mathbb{F}_q),\mathrm{U}(1))$.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了三维拓扑规范理论中连续群和有限群之间的关系，特别是SU(2)的Chern-Simons理论和Dijkgraaf-Witten理论，发现当有限域元素数量趋于无穷时，DW理论的渐近行为可以恢复CS理论在大水平极限下的主导渐近行为。
AI.motivation: 基于数学和物理学文献中的已知事实，研究三维拓扑规范理论中连续规范群（Chern-Simons理论）和有限规范群（Dijkgraaf-Witten理论）之间的关系，特别是当这两种群是同一代数群在复数域和有限域上的实现时。
AI.method: 聚焦于SU(2)例子，在闭三维流形上比较相应的配分函数（数学上对应Witten-Reshetikhin-Turaev和Dijkgraaf-Witten不变量），分析DW理论在有限域元素数量趋于无穷时的渐近行为，并开发了计算有限域上SL(2)表示簇点数的有效技术。
AI.result: 当三维流形不包含双曲分量时，DW理论在有限域元素数量趋于无穷时的渐近行为可以恢复CS理论在大水平极限下的主导渐近行为。同时开发了计算有限域上SL(2)表示簇点数的有效方法。
AI.conclusion: 连续规范群和有限规范群的拓扑规范理论之间存在深刻的联系，DW理论的渐近极限可以恢复CS理论的主导行为，这为理解两种理论之间的关系提供了新的视角，同时发展的计数技术具有独立的应用价值。

title: Affinization of Zinbiel bialgebras and pre-Poisson bialgebras, infinite-dimensional Poisson bialgebras
summary: The purpose of this paper is to construct infinite-dimensional Poisson bialgebras by the affinization of pre-Poisson algebras. There is a natural Poisson algebra structure on the tensor product of a pre-Poisson algebra and a perm algebra, and the Poisson algebra structure on the tensor product of a pre-Poisson algebra and a special perm algebra characterizes the pre-Poisson algebra. We extend such correspondences to the context of bialgebras, that is, there is a Poisson bialgebra structure on the tensor product of a pre-Poisson bialgebra and a quadratic $\bz$-graded perm algebra.In this process, we provide the affinization of Zinbiel bialgebras, and give a correspondence between symmetric solutions of the Yang-Baxter equation in pre-Poisson algebras and certain skew-symmetric solutions of the Yang-Baxter equation in the induced infinite-dimensional Poisson algebras. The similar correspondences for the related triangular bialgebra structures and $\mathcal{O}$-operators are given.

AI.tldr: 通过预泊松代数的仿射化构造无限维泊松双代数，建立了预泊松代数与perm代数张量积上的泊松代数结构，并将这种对应推广到双代数层面
AI.motivation: 构建无限维泊松双代数，探索预泊松代数与perm代数之间的结构关系，并建立杨-巴克斯特方程解在不同代数结构间的对应关系
AI.method: 通过预泊松代数的仿射化方法，研究预泊松代数与perm代数张量积上的泊松代数结构，推广到双代数层面，并建立杨-巴克斯特方程解在不同代数间的对应关系
AI.result: 成功构造了无限维泊松双代数，建立了预泊松双代数与二次Z-分次perm代数张量积上的泊松双代数结构，给出了Zinbiel双代数的仿射化，建立了杨-巴克斯特方程对称解与斜对称解之间的对应关系
AI.conclusion: 预泊松代数的仿射化为构造无限维泊松双代数提供了有效方法，建立了预泊松代数与perm代数之间的深刻结构联系，为杨-巴克斯特方程解在不同代数结构间的转换提供了理论框架

title: On free wreath products of classical groups
summary: We study the generalized free wreath product of classical groups introduced by the first author and Arthur Troupel. We give an explicit computation of the Haar state and deduce important properties of their associated operator algebra: in many cases, the von Neumann algebra is a full type ${\rm II}_1$-factor and the reduced C*-algebra is simple with unique trace.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了广义自由花环积群，给出了其Haar态的显式计算，并证明了相关算子代数的重要性质：在许多情况下，von Neumann代数是完全的II₁型因子，约化C*-代数是具有唯一迹的简单代数。
AI.motivation: 研究由第一作者和Arthur Troupel引入的经典群的广义自由花环积，探索其算子代数结构的基本性质。
AI.method: 对广义自由花环积群进行显式的Haar态计算，并基于此分析相关的von Neumann代数和C*-代数结构。
AI.result: 在许多情况下，证明了相关的von Neumann代数是完全的II₁型因子，约化C*-代数是简单代数且具有唯一迹。
AI.conclusion: 广义自由花环积群具有丰富的算子代数结构，其Haar态的显式计算为理解这些代数性质提供了关键工具。

title: Structural and Classification Theorems for Weyl-Type Algebras over Expolynomial Rings
comment: There are many mistakes and lapping with published in the literature
summary: This paper introduces and systematically studies Weyl-type, Witt-type, and non-associative algebras defined over expolynomial rings -- commutative rings generated by exponential functions $e^{αx}$, exponentials of exponentials $e^{\pm x^p e^{t}}$, and power functions $x^α$ for $α$ in an additive subgroup $\cA$ of a characteristic zero field $\FF$. We establish several fundamental structural results: scalar extensions preserve both the algebraic structure and simplicity; intermediate subalgebras associated with subgroups $\ZZ \subseteq \cB \subseteq \cA$ remain simple; the algebra of graded derivations is isomorphic to a semidirect product $\Weyl{e^{\pm x^p e^{t}},\; e^{\cA x},\; x^{\cA}} \rtimes \FF^n$; tensor products over disjoint variable sets decompose naturally into larger algebras; and a complete isomorphism criterion is given, showing that isomorphism depends precisely on the orbit of the parameter $p$ under the automorphism group of $\cA$ and the equality of the deformation parameter $t$. These theorems generalize classical results on Weyl and Witt algebras, provide new families of simple algebras, and offer a foundation for further research in deformation theory, representation theory, and cohomology.

AI.tldr: 该论文系统研究了基于指数多项式环的Weyl型、Witt型和非结合代数，建立了结构保持、简单性、导子代数同构、张量积分解和完全同构判据等基本定理。
AI.motivation: 推广经典Weyl和Witt代数的结果，构造新的简单代数家族，为变形理论、表示论和上同调研究提供基础。
AI.method: 在指数多项式环上定义Weyl型、Witt型和非结合代数，研究其结构性质：标量扩张保持代数结构和简单性；与子群相关的中间子代数保持简单性；分级导子代数同构于半直积；不相交变量集的张量积自然分解为更大代数。
AI.result: 建立了多个基本结构定理：标量扩张保持结构和简单性；中间子代数保持简单性；导子代数同构于Weyl{e^{±x^p e^t}, e^{Ax}, x^A} ⋊ F^n；张量积自然分解；给出了完全同构判据，表明同构仅依赖于参数p在A自同构群下的轨道和变形参数t的相等性。
AI.conclusion: 该研究推广了经典Weyl和Witt代数的结果，提供了新的简单代数家族，为变形理论、表示论和上同调的进一步研究奠定了基础。

title: Drinfeld associators and Kashiwara-Vergne associators in higher genera
summary: For $g\geq 0$, a genus $g$ Kashiwara-Vergne associator, introduced by Alekseev-Kawazumi-Kuno-Naef as a solution to the generalised KV equations in relation to the formality problem of the Goldman-Turaev Lie bialgebra on an oriented surface with a framing, is directly constructed from a genus $g$ analogue of a Drinfeld associator formulated by Gonzalez, which we call a Gonzalez-Drinfeld associator. The proof is based on Massuyeau's work in genus 0. The framing is automatically determined from the choice of a Gonzalez-Drinfeld associator, and in the case of genus 1, we show that only one particular framing is realised by our construction.

AI.tldr: 从Gonzalez-Drinfeld结合子直接构造出亏格g的Kashiwara-Vergne结合子，解决了Goldman-Turaev李双代数形式化问题中的广义KV方程
AI.motivation: 解决Goldman-Turaev李双代数在带定向曲面上的形式化问题，需要构造亏格g的Kashiwara-Vergne结合子作为广义KV方程的解
AI.method: 基于Massuyeau在亏格0的工作，从Gonzalez提出的亏格g Drinfeld结合子（称为Gonzalez-Drinfeld结合子）直接构造Kashiwara-Vergne结合子
AI.result: 成功构造出亏格g的Kashiwara-Vergne结合子，框架自动由Gonzalez-Drinfeld结合子的选择确定；在亏格1情况下，证明只有特定框架能被该构造实现
AI.conclusion: 建立了Gonzalez-Drinfeld结合子与Kashiwara-Vergne结合子之间的直接构造关系，为Goldman-Turaev李双代数的形式化问题提供了新的解决方案

title: Reduced coaction Lie algebra, double shuffle Lie algebra and noncommutative krv2 equation
comment: improved the presentation and correct typos
summary: We study the reduced coaction Lie algebra $\mathfrak{rc}_0$, which is defined by an algebraic equation satisfied by the reduced coaction (an upgraded version of the necklace cobracket) and the skew-symmetric condition. We prove that the double shuffle Lie algebra $\mathfrak{dmr}_0$ together with the skew-symmetric condition injects to $\mathfrak{rc}_0$, and that $\mathfrak{rc}_0$ together with the krv1 equation injects to the Kashiwara-Vergne Lie algebra $\mathfrak{krv}_2$.

AI.tldr: 论文研究了约化余作用李代数𝔯𝔠₀，证明了双重洗牌李代数𝔡𝔪𝔯₀（加上反对称条件）可单射嵌入𝔯𝔠₀，而𝔯𝔠₀（加上krv1方程）可单射嵌入Kashiwara-Vergne李代数𝔨𝔯𝔳₂。
AI.motivation: 研究约化余作用李代数𝔯𝔠₀的结构及其与其他重要李代数（双重洗牌李代数和Kashiwara-Vergne李代数）之间的关系，以深化对这些代数结构的理解。
AI.method: 通过代数方程定义约化余作用李代数𝔯𝔠₀，该方程由约化余作用（项链余括号的升级版本）和反对称条件满足。然后证明两个单射嵌入关系：𝔡𝔪𝔯₀ + 反对称条件 → 𝔯𝔠₀，以及𝔯𝔠₀ + krv1方程 → 𝔨𝔯𝔳₂。
AI.result: 成功证明了两个重要的单射嵌入：1) 双重洗牌李代数𝔡𝔪𝔯₀（加上反对称条件）可以单射嵌入到约化余作用李代数𝔯𝔠₀中；2) 约化余作用李代数𝔯𝔠₀（加上krv1方程）可以单射嵌入到Kashiwara-Vergne李代数𝔨𝔯𝔳₂中。
AI.conclusion: 约化余作用李代数𝔯𝔠₀在双重洗牌李代数和Kashiwara-Vergne李代数之间起到了桥梁作用，建立了这些重要代数结构之间的明确联系，为进一步研究这些代数之间的关系提供了理论基础。

title: A triangular decomposition for the crystal lattice of quantized function algebras
comment: v1: 21 pages. Comments welcome; v2: 26 pages, substantially rewritten, two sections and some references added
summary: We prove a triangular decomposition theorem for the lower crystal lattice $\mathcal{O}_{t}^{A_{0}}(G)$ of the quantized function algebra $\mathcal{O}_{t}(G)$, where $G$ is a connected simply connected complex Lie group with Lie algebra $\mathfrak{g}$ and compact real form $K$. As a consequence, we prove that $\mathcal{O}_{t}^{A_{0}}(G)$ is contained in $\mathcal{O}_{t}^{A_{0}}(K)$, as conjectured by Matassa & Yuncken. It also helps define the specialization map used by Matassa & Yuncken precisely, which helps simplify their description of the crystallized algebra. This allows us to prove that the crystallized algebra $C(K_{0})$ is a compact quantum semigroup, thus extending an earlier result for type $A_{n}$ compact quantum groups. We also prove that the notions of crystallized quantized function algebra given by Matassa & Yuncken coincide with that of Giri & Pal in the type $A_{n}$ case.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了量子函数代数下晶格的三角分解定理，验证了Matassa & Yuncken的猜想，并建立了结晶化代数与紧致量子半群的联系。
AI.motivation: 研究量子函数代数的下晶格结构，验证Matassa & Yuncken关于$\mathcal{O}_{t}^{A_{0}}(G)$包含于$\mathcal{O}_{t}^{A_{0}}(K)$的猜想，并精确化特殊化映射以简化结晶化代数的描述。
AI.method: 证明量子函数代数下晶格$\mathcal{O}_{t}^{A_{0}}(G)$的三角分解定理，利用该结果建立包含关系，并精确定义特殊化映射。
AI.result: 1. 证明了三角分解定理；2. 验证了$\mathcal{O}_{t}^{A_{0}}(G)\subseteq\mathcal{O}_{t}^{A_{0}}(K)$的猜想；3. 精确化了特殊化映射；4. 证明了结晶化代数$C(K_{0})$是紧致量子半群；5. 在$A_{n}$型情况下证明了Matassa & Yuncken与Giri & Pal定义的结晶化量子函数代数的一致性。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为量子群理论提供了重要的结构定理，验证了相关猜想，建立了不同定义之间的联系，并将紧致量子群的结果推广到更一般的紧致量子半群。

title: Cyclic Representations of $U_q(\hat{\mathfrak{sl}}_2)$ and its Borel Subalgebras at Roots of Unity and Q-operators
comment: 31 pages (notational glossary added and minor corrections)
summary: We consider the cyclic representations $Ω_{rs}$ of $ U_q(\widehat{\mathfrak{sl}}_2)$ at $q^N=1$ that depend upon two points $r,s$ in the chiral Potts algebraic curve. We show how $Ω_{rs}$ is related to the tensor product $ρ_r\otimes \barρ_s$ of two representations of the upper Borel subalgebra of $U_q(\widehat{\mathfrak{sl}}_2)$. This result is analogous to the factorization property of the Verma module of $U_q(\widehat{\mathfrak{sl}}_2)$ at generic-$q$ in terms of two q-oscillator representation of the Borel subalgebra - a key step in the construction of the Q-operator. We construct short exact sequences of the different representations and use the results to construct Q operators that satisfy TQ relations for $q^N=1$ for both the 6-vertex and $τ_2$ models.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了在q^N=1时U_q(̂sl_2)的循环表示Ω_{rs}，展示了其与上Borel子代数两个表示张量积ρ_r⊗ρ_s的关系，并构造了满足TQ关系的Q算子。
AI.motivation: 研究在q^N=1时U_q(̂sl_2)的循环表示与chiral Potts代数曲线上点的关系，旨在建立类似一般q情况下Verma模分解的因子化性质，为构造Q算子奠定基础。
AI.method: 将循环表示Ω_{rs}与上Borel子代数的两个表示ρ_r⊗ρ_s联系起来，构造不同表示之间的短正合序列，并利用这些结果构造满足TQ关系的Q算子。
AI.result: 成功建立了Ω_{rs}与ρ_r⊗ρ_s之间的对应关系，构造了短正合序列，并最终构造出在q^N=1时同时适用于6-vertex和τ_2模型的Q算子，这些算子满足TQ关系。
AI.conclusion: 在q^N=1的特殊情况下，成功建立了U_q(̂sl_2)循环表示的因子化性质，并基于此构造了满足TQ关系的Q算子，为相关可积模型的研究提供了新工具。

title: From smooth dynamical twists to twistors of quantum groupoids
summary: Consider a Lie subalgebra $\mathfrak{l} \subset \mathfrak{g}$ and an $\mathfrak{l}$-invariant open submanifold $V \subset \mathfrak{l}^{\ast}$. We demonstrate that any smooth dynamical twist on $V$, valued in $U(\mathfrak{g}) \otimes U(\mathfrak{g})\llbracket \hbar \rrbracket$, establishes a twistor on the associated quantum groupoid when combined with the Gutt star product on the cotangent bundle $T^\ast L$ of a Lie group $L$ that integrates $\mathfrak{l}$. This result provides a framework for constructing equivariant star products from smooth dynamical twists on those Poisson homogeneous spaces arising from nondegenerate polarized Lie algebras, leveraging the structure of twistors of quantum groupoids.

AI.tldr: 该论文展示了光滑动力扭曲与Gutt星积结合可在余切丛上构建量子群胚扭曲子，为从非退化极化李代数产生的泊松齐次空间构造等变星积提供了框架。
AI.motivation: 研究如何通过光滑动力扭曲构造量子群胚的扭曲子，从而为从非退化极化李代数产生的泊松齐次空间提供等变星积的构造方法。
AI.method: 考虑李子代数$\mathfrak{l} \subset \mathfrak{g}$和$\mathfrak{l}$-不变开子流形$V \subset \mathfrak{l}^{\ast}$，将$V$上取值于$U(\mathfrak{g}) \otimes U(\mathfrak{g})\llbracket \hbar \rrbracket$的光滑动力扭曲与李群$L$的余切丛$T^\ast L$上的Gutt星积结合，构建量子群胚的扭曲子。
AI.result: 证明了任何这样的光滑动力扭曲都能与Gutt星积结合，在相关量子群胚上建立扭曲子，从而为从非退化极化李代数产生的泊松齐次空间构造等变星积提供了系统框架。
AI.conclusion: 光滑动力扭曲与Gutt星积的结合为量子群胚扭曲子的构造提供了有效方法，这一框架使得能够从非退化极化李代数产生的泊松齐次空间系统地构造等变星积。

title: A$_\infty$ deformations of extended Khovanov arc algebras and Stroppel's conjecture
summary:
Extended Khovanov arc algebras $\mathrm{K}_m^n$ are graded associative algebras which naturally appear in a variety of contexts, from knot and link homology, low-dimensional topology and topological quantum field theory to representation theory and symplectic geometry. C. Stroppel conjectured in her ICM 2010 address that the bigraded Hochschild cohomology groups of $\mathrm{K}_m^n$ vanish in a certain range, implying that the algebras $\mathrm K_m^n$ admit no nontrivial A$_\infty$ deformations, in particular that the algebras are intrinsically formal.
  Whereas Stroppel's Conjecture is known to hold for the algebras $\mathrm K_m^1$ and $\mathrm K_1^n$ by work of Seidel and Thomas, we show that $\mathrm K_m^n$ does in fact admit nontrivial A$_\infty$ deformations with nonvanishing higher products for all $m, n \geq 2$.
  We describe both $\mathrm K_m^n$ and its Koszul dual concretely as path algebras of quivers with relations and give an explicit algebraic construction of A$_\infty$ deformations of $\mathrm K_m^n$ by using the correspondence between A$_\infty$ deformations of a Koszul algebra and filtered associative deformations of its Koszul dual. These deformations can also be viewed as A$_\infty$ deformations of Fukaya--Seidel categories associated to Hilbert schemes of surfaces based on recent work of Mak and Smith.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明扩展Khovanov弧代数K_m^n存在非平凡的A_∞变形，推翻了Stroppel的猜想，并给出了具体的代数构造。
AI.motivation: 研究扩展Khovanov弧代数K_m^n的A_∞变形问题，验证Stroppel在2010年ICM报告中提出的猜想——这些代数在特定范围内的高阶同调群为零，因此不存在非平凡的A_∞变形。
AI.method: 将K_m^n及其Koszul对偶具体描述为带关系的箭图路径代数，利用Koszul代数的A_∞变形与其Koszul对偶的过滤结合变形之间的对应关系，显式构造K_m^n的A_∞变形。
AI.result: 证明对所有m,n≥2，K_m^n确实存在非平凡A_∞变形且具有非零高阶乘积，推翻了Stroppel猜想。这些变形也可视为基于Mak和Smith近期工作的Fukaya-Seidel范畴的A_∞变形。
AI.conclusion: 扩展Khovanov弧代数K_m^n（m,n≥2）存在非平凡A_∞变形，这与Stroppel猜想相反。该结果通过显式代数构造实现，并建立了与辛几何中Fukaya-Seidel范畴变形的联系。

title: Higher representations and cornered Heegaard Floer homology
summary: We develop the 2-representation theory of the odd one-dimensional super Lie algebra $gl(1|1)^+$ and show it controls the Heegaard-Floer theory of surfaces of Lipshitz, Ozsváth and Thurston. Our main tool is the construction of a tensor product for 2-representations. We show it corresponds to a gluing operation for surfaces, or the chord diagrams of arc decompositions. This provides an extension of Heegaard-Floer theory to dimension one, expanding the work of Douglas, Lipshitz and Manolescu.

AI.tldr: 本文构建了超李代数gl(1|1)^+的2-表示理论，并证明其控制曲面的Heegaard-Floer理论，通过张量积构造对应曲面的粘合操作。
AI.motivation: 扩展Heegaard-Floer理论到一维，建立超李代数表示理论与拓扑不变量之间的联系，深化对曲面Heegaard-Floer理论的理解。
AI.method: 开发超李代数gl(1|1)^+的2-表示理论，构建2-表示的张量积运算，证明该运算对应曲面的粘合操作和弦图分解。
AI.result: 建立了gl(1|1)^+的2-表示理论与曲面Heegaard-Floer理论的对应关系，张量积运算精确对应拓扑中的粘合操作，扩展了Douglas、Lipshitz和Manolescu的工作。
AI.conclusion: 超李代数gl(1|1)^+的2-表示理论为Heegaard-Floer理论提供了代数框架，将拓扑操作转化为代数运算，实现了该理论向一维的扩展。
